FuncDef: The display isis interface command displays information on IS-IS interfaces. The display isis interface command displays information on IS-IS interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
If no IS-IS process is specified, information about interfaces in all local IS-IS processes is displayed.

Specifies the interface type and interface number.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Displays interface information about an IS-IS multi-instance process in a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
